Description:
Detects file names with specific patterns seen generated and used by tools such as Mimikatz and DSInternals related to exported or stolen DPAPI backup keys and certificates.


Author: Nounou Mbeiri, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DPAPI Backup Keys And Certificate Export Activity IOC
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (filepath like '%ntds_capi_%' or filepath like '%ntds_legacy_%' or filepath like '%ntds_unknown_%') and (filepath like '%.cer' or filepath like '%.key' or filepath like '%.pfx' or filepath like '%.pvk')
